ml_tags: Christoper John 24.07.1945 - 18.09.2023 24.12.1949 - Dearly loved husband of Gloria Christopher Loved Father Sleep in Heavenly Peace "and the spirit goes back to God Who gave it..." Darling wife of Much loved son of John & Joyce Pickford Much loved daughter of Robert and Alice Curtis of Ricky, Alicia, Jonathan, Jeremy and Christine. family and friends. In  Loving Memory Of PICKFORD Much loved by all their grandchildren, great grandchildren, Gloria Anne Nee Curtis (Pihoihoi)
